column4: im trying to change permissions on some folders. i used sudo chmod 777 as well as right click the folder and giving write permissions, and doing the same with nautilus. Every time I click on "apply permissions to enclosed files" or close, the permissions disappear. any clues?
does the file system, that contains the folders, support permissions?
i think so. how do i check?
look in the output of "mount", which type it is
i have been able to chmod files in the past but for some reason its not working now
